content: The unit economics underpinning our record performance continued to shine as well, with average monthly reoccurring revenue per user increasing to nearly $70 and net service cost per subscriber dropping to $9.43, another all-time low. During the quarter, we reported growth in total subscribers of 4.2% versus the prior year period, reaching $1.92 million as of September 30th. Like revenue, adjusted EBITDA grew nicely in the third quarter of 2022, finishing at $195.5 million, up 23.3% from the same period in 2021. We continued our trend of year-over-year improvement in net service cost per subscriber, dropping from $10.90 in the third quarter of 2021 to an all-time low of $9.43, including financing fees in the third quarter of 2022.
